posts.title: h5转换标签应用
posts.excerpt: 实现内容鼠标移动到区域，内容翻转。 内容翻转
posts.text: 实现内容鼠标移动到区域，内容翻转。 内容翻转 <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Document</title> <style> * { margin: 0; padding: 0; } body { perspective: 400px; } .box { position: relative; height: 300px; width: 300px; margin: 0 auto; transition: all 0.4s; transform-style: preserve-3d; } .box:hover { transform: rotateY(180deg); } .front, .back { position: absolute; height: 100%; width: 100%; top: 0; left: 0; text-align: center; line-height: 300px; border-radius: 50%; } .front { background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #4facfe 0%, #00f2fe 100%); } .back { background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #fa709a 0%, #fee140 100%); transform: rotateY(180deg); } </style> </head> <body> <div class="box"> <div class="front">我爱我的祖国</div> <div class="back">哈哈</div> </div> </body> </html>

posts.title: 我的第一个博客文章
posts.text: 开始 创建新的项目 <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Document</title> <style> * { padding: 0; margin: 0; } body { perspective: 1000px; } section { position: relative; height: 300px; width: 400px; margin: 150px auto; transform-style: preserve-3d; animation: identifier 8s linear infinite; } @keyframes identifier { from { transform: rotateY(); } to { transform: rotateY(360deg); } } div { position: absolute; height: 100%; width: 100%; top: 0; left: 0; position: absolute; background: url(https://ss0.bdstatic.com/70cFuHSh_Q1YnxGkpoWK1HF6hhy/it/u=4273723191,874321619&fm=26&gp=0.jpg); } section:hover { animation-play-state: paused; } section div:nth-child(1) { transform: translateZ(400px); } section div:nth-child(2) { transform: rotateY(60deg) translateZ(400px); } section div:nth-child(3) { transform: rotateY(120deg) translateZ(400px); } section div:nth-child(4) { transform: rotateY(180deg) translateZ(400px); } section div:nth-child(5) { transform: rotateY(240deg) translateZ(400px); } section div:nth-child(6) { transform: rotateY(300deg) translateZ(400px); } </style> </head> <body> <section> <div></div> <div></div> <div></div> <div></div> <div></div> <div></div> </section> </body> </html>
